meanings.definition: Willing to take risks or try new things.
meanings.sent1: The adventuresome explorer bravely ventured into the unknown jungle.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her adventuresome spirit, always eager to try new activities.
meanings.sent3: The adventuresome puppy decided to explore the backyard on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her adventuresome nature led her to pursue a career in extreme sports.
meanings.sent5: The adventuresome astronaut embarked on a mission to Mars, ready for any challenge.

meanings.sent1: The adventuresome movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride was truly adventuresome, with twists and turns.
meanings.sent3: The adventuresome squirrel attempted to climb the tallest tree in the park.
meanings.sent4: His adventuresome personality made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The adventuresome skydiver leaped from the plane with exhilaration.
